name: Bard
description: Bards are versatile performers and spellcasters, using music and magic to inspire allies and confound foes. They can cast spells from a wide range of schools and are known for their charm and wit.

name: Cleric
description: Clerics are divine spellcasters who draw power from a deity or divine force. They can heal, protect, and smite their enemies, serving as both warriors and healers.

name: Druid
description: Druids are guardians of nature, able to shapeshift into animals and wield nature-based magic. They can heal, summon creatures, and control the elements.

name: Sorcerer
description: Sorcerers are innate spellcasters who possess magical abilities due to their bloodline or a mystical event. They can cast spells spontaneously and are known for their raw magical power.

name: Warlock
description: Warlocks are spellcasters who gain their powers through a pact with an otherworldly patron. They wield eldritch magic and can cast spells that manipulate reality in unique ways.

name: Wizard
description: Wizards are scholarly spellcasters who learn and master magic through study and practice. They can cast a wide variety of spells and are known for their intelligence and versatility.
